website_summaries.verdict: A natural-flavored water that generates praise for containing antioxidants and interesting flavors, but may be too sweet for some.
pros: Made with filtered water and the juices of fruits and vegetables with no artificial sweeteners
Contains antioxidants and is low in calories
Customers love the unique fruit flavors that include blueberry, clementine, mango, and more
cons: Sweetened with stevia extract, which is natural but may leave an aftertaste
Some who have tried it say the flavor is overly sweet

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Blueberry Bai is probably the most delicious drink I’ve ever had and with only 1 gram of sugar I can indulge without feeling guilty! This has so much flavor and I don’t know how I ever survived without it. I add just a little Bai blueberry to my large water bottle with a couple drops of lemon essential oil... mmm! Staying hydrated never tasted so good.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Bad might be a watered down drink but it still ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad might be a watered down drink but it still has flavor. Thing I like about it that the sugars are from more natural based stevia and Erythritol. Got the wife off of drinking soda completely so have to love that. Tried most flavors and they seem fairly good. Also Fooducate gives this product a B to B+. I recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Vertrep

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and keeps me energized
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in my favorite flavor Blueberry. It has a slight perfumey flavor but nothing too over powering. The coffee bean caffeine helps with weight loss and energy. I only drink these first thing in the morning since it contains 70% caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Sixx Kitten

customer_reviews.title: No real juice
customer_reviews.text: I doubt there’s any real juice in this; tastes like chemical flavoring and tap water. Very thin consistency; doesn’t justify the high price.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bai Flavor
customer_reviews.text: We love Bai, but don't love the clementine flavor that always seems to come in the variety pack, so happy to find just blueberry which is our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: I love this flavored water.
customer_reviews.text: Blueberry was always one of my favorite flavors. I needed to drink more water and get off of diet soda. This drink did it plus it has antioxidant infusion.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen P Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of all time Bai flavored drink. Typically have 1 once a day, in the evenings, after dinner. Packaged in a clean, undamaged box. Expiration is February 2020. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and almost no carbs
customer_reviews.text: This is now my drink of choice to avoid carbs and sweeteners that cause an insulin response. Amazon has the best prices I've found, especially through Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: You had one job...
customer_reviews.text: Outside box says blueberry; but inside box was watermelon. You had one job...
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, Tasty, No High Fructose Corn Syrup
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of Brasilia Blueberry. It's better for you than soda and less acidic than 100% juice. It also has fewer calories than juice.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Not a great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about the effectiveness of antioxidants, I did not like the taste and aftertaste of this water. Will not buy this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: KRK

customer_reviews.title: Favorite drinks arrive conveniently
customer_reviews.text: I love Bai blueberry drinks. This is the easiest and most cost effective way to buy them and they always arrive in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Gail McVey

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They do not have that chemical medicinal aftertaste that so many similar drinks have. They are however expensive
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drink
customer_reviews.text: So good and a great alternative if you do not drink sodas. Bought for diabetic parents. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting Blueberry Bai drink!
customer_reviews.text: I like all the Bai flavors but Blueberry is my favorite! Online price is cheaper than store unless the store is having a sale. I have mine on auto ship.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed flavor. Next time I’ll freeze and make a slushy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: The product is great. The way this package came and the price ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The way this package came and the price for 6 is outrageous. My package arrive this morning dripping and covered in disgusting stains. Had to wash the remaining 4 bottles down. Not how you want a delivery to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Djames

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a quality beverage!
customer_reviews.text: Great beverage and an excellent value. I will be getting this evwry month!
customer_reviews.author: Alie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A better price than in the store. I drink this every morning and love it.
customer_reviews.author: bchlvr

customer_reviews.title: Helps you increase your daily water intake!
customer_reviews.text: I need to drink more water and Bai makes it easy. The
customer_reviews.author: Lucy T

customer_reviews.title: Increase your water and vitamin intake.
customer_reviews.text: Best flavor. Good price. Helps me keep up my water intake. Clever description on label.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Werbiansky

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Tastes ok, a littl bit like artificial sugar. I probably won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sacul

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, good price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is delicious, and at roughly 10 calories a container, a good calorie-conscious option. This is some of the best pricing I have found both online and in-store for this.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Careful when you buy to compare!!!
customer_reviews.text: Careful when you click reorder.....they might take you to another higher priced item than your last buy. There are better deals for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dz

customer_reviews.title: Great soda substitute
customer_reviews.text: Amazon’s price is a lot better than the grocery store. Great substitute for soda without the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: i love the Bai drinks and this is the best place to get them
customer_reviews.author: Tina Paytes

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and price
customer_reviews.text: BAI drinks are delicious. orange is my favorite flavor and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: LMF

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and low calorie. Best drink for those who cares about their belly.
customer_reviews.author: Creative anomaly

customer_reviews.title: Love bai5 but not @ 3
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered more than a pack of 6 - if not, I have to be more careful when ordering at that price. Love bai5 but not @ 3.00 or more per bottle. I can buy them at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: They are delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love the bai waters. My favorites are the blueberry, watermelon and coconut flavors. I buy these all the time. I wish they were a little cheaper but they are not expensive and they are so yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Its low calorie
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is awesome very cooling drink and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lopeman mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Bai drinks are the best tasting of all water drinks,
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting of all Bai drinks!! My favorite! Packaging could be better, but arrived fine! Need to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these drinks and I love the price of them!
customer_reviews.author: mholladay

customer_reviews.title: Love this produce
customer_reviews.text: Love this produce, not that it is getting warmer day after day, I enjoy this product more than I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ansong

customer_reviews.title: Cost is too high!
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent product, but way overpriced! Even with free shipping. I can buy it at the grocery store for $2.39 a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: nice water alternative
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't taste quite as good as prior orders. Maybe I got a different blueberry. The country changes between order and cart.
customer_reviews.author: E S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bottle cap won't come off, called them, they said a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Starnes Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: These drinks are delicious and so good for you. They are low in sugar and calories. Very refreshing . I have had the berry and pomegranate and they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: lingcat

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's 6 pack for price of 12, many people probably didn't notice it and bought them. Very sneaky Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to resign bottle with less liquid and lower price easy accessible cap V
customer_reviews.text: Need to resign bottle with less liquid and lower price easy accessible cap V v
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty, I like that it does not have sugar but natural sweeteners. Delivered right to my door, easy to pack for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Yum! Great value
customer_reviews.text: Yum! This is the best deal I’ve found for the blueberry flavor online. Unless Publix has its BOGOF deal on these, it’s the cheapest I’ve found for the Blueberry period. Low glycemic! We love Bai!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary & Jaclyn Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Hope it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: cuz it tastes like they didn't put enough coolaid in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Lefebvre

product_meta.title: Bai Flavored Water, Brasilia Blueberry, Antioxidant Infused Drinks, 18 Fluid Ounce Bottles, 6 Count
product_meta.description: Bai Brasilia Blueberry Antioxidant Infused Beverage delivers delicious fruity refreshment without unwanted sugar and calories. Infused with antioxidants and made with no artificial sweeteners, Bai Brasilia Blueberry has only 10 calories and 1 gram of sugar per serving for delicious hydration you can feel good about. Bursting with bright flavor like fresh-picked berries on a sunny summer day, Bai Brasilia Blueberry brings bold flavor into your life.
feature_bullets: FLAVORED WATER DRINKS – overflowing with blueberry fruit flavor
HEALTHY FLAVOR AND JUST 10 calories – low calorie, shouldn’t mean low flavor. Bai works to deliver low calorie, bold fruity flavor so that you don’t have to sacrifice.
FREE OF ARTIFICIAL SWEETENERS – and made with just one gram of sugar per serving.
ANTIOXIDANT INFUSED – as well as gluten-free, non-GMO, vegan and kosher, with low glycemic index
CAFFEINE – contains 30mg of caffeine per serving.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
